member.name: T:RuckusAlexaLibrary.Intent
member.summary: The intent object that represents what the user wants.

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.Intent.name
member.summary: A string representing the name of the intent.

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.Intent.slots
member.summary: A map of key-value pairs that further describes what the user meant based on a predefined intent schema.

member.name: T:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle
member.summary: The request bundle object that is sent to the Alexa service. Bundled to encapsulate request functionality.

member.name: M:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new RequestBundle object

member.name: M:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,RuckusAlexaLibrary.Intent,System.String,System.String,System.String,RuckusAlexaLibrary.ConnectionResponse_Status,RuckusAlexaLibrary.ConnectionResponse_Payload,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: /// Initializes a new RequestBundle object

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle.Type
member.summary: Describes the request type

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle.RequestId
member.summary: Represents a unique identifier for the specific request.

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle.Timestamp
member.summary: Provides the date and time when Alexa sent the request as an ISO 8601 formatted string. Used to verify the request when hosting your skill as a web service.

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle.Intent
member.summary: An object that represents what the user wants.

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle.Reason
member.summary: Describes why the session ended.

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle.DialogState
member.summary: Enumeration indicating the status of the multi-turn dialog. This property is included if the skill meets the requirements to use the Dialog directives Possible values"

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle.name
member.summary: A string representing the name of the intent

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle.status
member.summary: Provides details of the HTTP status
member.remarks: Used for In Skill Purchasing, to resume the skill after the purchase flow.

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle.payload
member.summary: Contains details for the specified action. For a purchase request, this includes the InSkillProduct property with a product ID.

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle.token
member.summary: A token to identify this message exchange and store skill information. The token is not used by Alexa, but is returned in the resulting Connections.Response. You provide this token in a format that makes sense for the skill.

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle.confirmationStatus
member.summary: Dialog status used to confirm fields that require confirmation as laid out in your Dialog Model

member.name: M:RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle.GetRequestType
member.summary: Returns type of request

member.name: T:RuckusAlexaLibrary.Response
member.summary: The response.

member.name: T:RuckusAlexaLibrary.SkillRequest
member.summary: The request object container sent to the Alexa service.

member.name: M:RuckusAlexaLibrary.SkillRequest.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new SkillRequest object

member.name: M:RuckusAlexaLibrary.SkillRequest.#ctor(System.String,RuckusAlexaLibrary.Session,RuckusAlexaLibrary.RequestBundle,RuckusAlexaLibrary.Context)
member.summary: Initializes a new SkillRequest object with parameters

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.SkillRequest.Version
member.summary: The version specifier for the request with the value defined as: "1.0"

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.SkillRequest.Session
member.summary: The session object provides additional context associated with the request.

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.SkillRequest.Request
member.summary: Contains the request object, interfaces for Launch Request, Intent Request, and Session Ended Request,

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.SkillRequest.Context
member.summary: The context object provides your skill with information about the current state of the Alexa service and device at the time the request is sent to your service. This is included on all requests. For requests sent in the context of a session (LaunchRequest and IntentRequest), the context object duplicates the user and application information that is also available in the session.

member.name: M:RuckusAlexaLibrary.SkillRequest.GetRequestType
member.summary: Returns type of request
member.returns: Type of ILaunchRequest, IIntentRequest, or ISessionEndedRequest

member.name: T:RuckusAlexaLibrary.SkillResponse
member.summary: The response object container returned from the Alexa service.

member.name: M:RuckusAlexaLibrary.SkillResponse.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new SkillResponse object

member.name: M:RuckusAlexaLibrary.SkillResponse.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},RuckusAlexaLibrary.Response)
member.summary: Initializes a new SkillResponse object with parameters

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.SkillResponse.Version
member.summary: The version specifier for the response with the value to be defined as: "1.0"

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.SkillResponse.SessionAttributes
member.summary: A map of key-value pairs to persist in the session. The key is a string that represents the name of the attribute.Type: string. The value is an object that represents the value of the attribute. Type: object. Session attributes are ignored if included in a response to an AudioPlayer or PlaybackController request.

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.SkillResponse.Response
member.summary: A response object that defines what to render to the user and whether to end the current session.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:RuckusAlexaLibrary.Slot.Name
member.summary: A string that represents the name of the slot.
